scripts.dev: npx cross-env AUDIENCE=TestAWSAccount cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env IS_LOCAL=1 sls offline start --ignoreJWTSignature --stage offline
scripts.test: npx cross-env AUDIENCE=TestAWSAccount cross-env IS_LOCAL=1 cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest -i --coverage --colors --verbose
scripts.test2: npx cross-env AUDIENCE=TestAWSAccount cross-env IS_LOCAL=1 cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest -i --coverage --colors
